panels.description: Rate request per second in a 5 min interval. Filtered by route, method, status and instance.
panels.title: Request Rate [5m]

panels.description: Average request time duration in a 5 min interval. Filtered by route, method, status and instance.

targets.expr: 1000 * (rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_sum{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", instance=~"$instance"}[5m]) / rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", instance=~"$instance"}[5m]))

panels.title: Avg Request Duration [5m]

panels.description: Average rate request per second in a 5 min interval aggregate by instance. Filtered by route, method, status.

targets.expr: avg(rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])) by (route, method, status)

panels.title: Request Rate Aggregate by Instance [5m]

panels.description: Average request time duration in a 5 min interval aggregate by instances. Filtered by route, method, status.

targets.expr: 1000 * avg((rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_sum{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", instance=~"$instance"}[5m]) / rate(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", instance=~"$instance"}[5m]))) by (route, method, status)

panels.title: Avg Request Duration Aggregate by instances [5m]

panels.description: Total number of requests filtered by route, method, status and instance.
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Total average time duration from a request. Filtered by route, method, status and instance

targets.expr: 1000 * avg(sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_sum{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", instance=~"$instance"} / sdp_http_requests_duration_seconds_count{route=~"$route", method=~"$method", status=~"$status", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Total Avg Request Time Duration [ms]

panels.description: Rate successful query per second in a 5 min interval. Filtered by query_type and instance.
panels.title: Successful Query Rate [5m]

panels.description: Average successful query duration in a 5 min interval. Filtered by query_type and instance.
panels.title: Avg Successful Query Duration [5m]

panels.description: Average rate successful query per second in a 5 min interval. Filtered by query_type.
panels.title: Successful Query Rate Aggregate By Instances [5m]

panels.description: Average successful query duration in a 5 min interval aggregate by instances. Filtered by query_type.
panels.title: Avg Succesful Query Duration Aggregate By Instances[5m]

panels.description: Rate failure query per second in a 5 min interval. Filtered by query_type and instance.
panels.title: Failure Query Rate [5m]

panels.description: Average failure query duration in a 5 min interval. Filtered by query_type and instance.
panels.title: Avg Failure Query Duration [5m]

panels.description: Average rate failure query per second in a 5 min interval. Filtered by query_type.
panels.title: Failure Query Rate Aggregate By Instances [5m]

panels.description: Average failure query duration in a 5 min interval aggregate by instances. Filtered by query_type.
panels.title: Avg Failure Query Duration Aggregate By Instances[5m]

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, endpoint, method) (rate(sdp_circle_circle_api_request_duration_seconds_bucket[1m]) or vector(0)) )

panels.title: Circle API - 95th Percentile Request Duration by Endpoint and Method
Circle API - Average Request Duration by Method and Endpoint
Circle API - Histogram of Request Durations
